description: Deletes a tag from an Amazon Web Services Payment Cryptography key. Cross-account use: This operation can't be used across different Amazon Web Services accounts.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The KeyARN of the key whose tags are being removed.

parameters.name: TagKeys
parameters.description: One or more tag keys. Don't include the tag values. If the Amazon Web Services Payment Cryptography key doesn't have the specified tag key, Amazon Web Services Payment Cryptography doesn't throw an exception or return a response. To confirm that the operation succeeded, use the ListTagsForResource operation. (string) ---
